% TPICTEST.TEX  --- showing some sample uses of TPIC \specials
% Copyright 2007 TeX Users Group.
% You may freely use, modify and/or distribute this file.

% Normally the \specials would be generated by some macro package;
% Here they are shown `raw' to illustrate the basic idea.

% NOTE: the \noindent's are required to get into horizontal mode.
% NOTE: the %'s at the ends of lines are required to avoid horizontal space.

% NOTE: there is some ambiguity regarding line terminations and line join

\def\newpage{\vfill\eject}

\noindent Sample dashed/dotted rectangular paths 

\noindent
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 3000 0}%
\special{pa 3000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{da 135}
\special{da .135}
\hskip 3.5in
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 3000 0}%
\special{pa 3000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{dt 135}
\special{dt .135}

\vskip 1.1in

\noindent These are some polygonal lines, solid, dashed and dotted

\noindent
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 0}%
\special{pa 200 100}%
\special{pa 400 200}%
\special{pa 600 200}%
\special{pa 800 300}%
\special{pa 1200 700}%
\special{pa 1500 800}%
\special{fp}
\hskip 2in
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 0}%
\special{pa 200 100}%
\special{pa 400 200}%
\special{pa 600 200}%
\special{pa 800 300}%
\special{pa 1200 700}%
\special{pa 1500 800}%
% \special{da 50}
\special{da .05}
\hskip 2in
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 0}%
\special{pa 200 100}%
\special{pa 400 200}%
\special{pa 600 200}%
\special{pa 800 300}%
\special{pa 1200 700}%
\special{pa 1500 800}%
% \special{dt 100}
\special{dt .1}

\vskip 1in

\noindent These are some splines, solid, dashed and dotted

\noindent
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 0}%
\special{pa 200 100}%
\special{pa 400 200}%
\special{pa 600 200}%
\special{pa 800 300}%
\special{pa 1200 700}%
\special{pa 1500 800}%
\special{sp}
\hskip 2in
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 0}%
\special{pa 200 100}%
\special{pa 400 200}%
\special{pa 600 200}%
\special{pa 800 300}%
\special{pa 1200 700}%
\special{pa 1500 800}%
% \special{sp 100}
\special{sp .1}
\hskip 2in
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 0}%
\special{pa 200 100}%
\special{pa 400 200}%
\special{pa 600 200}%
\special{pa 800 300}%
\special{pa 1200 700}%
\special{pa 1500 800}%
% \special{sp -100}
\special{sp -.1}

\vskip 1.1in

\noindent And now for some fake sinusoids

\vskip 1.05in

\noindent
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 500}%
\special{pa 200 866}%
\special{pa 300 1000}%
\special{pa 400 866}%
\special{pa 500 500}%
\special{pa 600 0}%
\special{pa 700 -500}%
\special{pa 800 -866}%
\special{pa 900 -1000}%
\special{pa 1000 -866}%
\special{pa 1100 -500}%
\special{pa 1200 0}%
\special{sp}%
\hskip 1.2in
\hskip 0.25in
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 200 500}%
\special{pa 400 866}%
\special{pa 600 1000}%
\special{pa 800 866}%
\special{pa 1000 500}%
\special{pa 1200 0}%
\special{pa 1400 -500}%
\special{pa 1600 -866}%
\special{pa 1800 -1000}%
\special{pa 2000 -866}%
\special{pa 2200 -500}%
\special{pa 2400 0}%
\special{sp}%
\hskip 2.40in
\hskip 0.25in
\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 100 500}%
\special{pa 200 866}%
\special{pa 300 1000}%
\special{pa 400 866}%
\special{pa 500 500}%
\special{pa 600 0}%
\special{pa 700 -500}%
\special{pa 800 -866}%
\special{pa 900 -1000}%
\special{pa 1000 -866}%
\special{pa 1100 -500}%
\special{pa 1200 0}%
\special{sp}

\vskip 1in

\newpage

% PAGE 2

% NOTE: there is some ambiguity about how to treat closed spline curves 

\noindent Now for solid quadratic splines defined by a box shape

\vskip .1in

\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 1000 0}%
\special{pa 6000 0}%
\special{pa 6000 2000}%
\special{pa 1000 2000}%
% \special{pa 0 0}%
\special{sp}

\vskip 2.2in

\noindent Now for a dashed quadratic splines defined by a box shape

\vskip .1in

\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 1000 0}%
\special{pa 6000 0}%
\special{pa 6000 2000}%
\special{pa 1000 2000}%
% \special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{sp 200}
\special{sp .2}

\vskip 2.2in

\noindent Now for a dotted quadratic splines defined by a box shape

\vskip .1in

\special{pn 20}%
\special{pa 1000 0}%
\special{pa 6000 0}%
\special{pa 6000 2000}%
\special{pa 1000 2000}%
% \special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{sp -200}
\special{sp -.2}

\vskip 2.2in

\newpage

% PAGE 3

\noindent Show some stroked circles, not filled, and filled

\vskip .05in

\noindent
\special{pn 100}%
\special{ar 1000 1000 1000 1000 0.0 6.283185307}%
\hskip 2.5in%
\special{sh}%
\special{ar 1000 1000 1000 1000 0.0 6.283185307}%

\vskip 2.1in

\noindent Show some circular disk ({\it not} stroked), not shaded and shaded

\vskip .1in

\noindent
\special{ia 1000 1000 1000 1000 0.0 6.283185307}%
\hskip 2.5in%
\special{sh}%
\special{ia 1000 1000 1000 1000 0.0 6.283185307}

\vskip 2.1in

\noindent Show some ellipses ({\it not} stroked), not shaded and shaded

\vskip .1in

\noindent
\special{pn 20}%
\special{ia 1000 500 1000 500 0.0 6.283185307}%
\hskip 2.5in%
\special{sh}%
\special{ia 1000 500 1000 500 0.0 6.283185307}

\vskip 1in

\newpage

% PAGE 4

\noindent Rectangle, stroked default pen and 0.1in pen

\vskip .05in

\noindent 
% \special{pn 10}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{fp}
\hskip 2.5in
\special{pn 100}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{fp}

\vskip 1.1in

\noindent Rectangle, filled and stroked with 0.1in pen plus filled

\vskip .1in

\noindent 
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{bk}%
\special{ip}
\hskip 2.5in
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{bk}%
\special{fp}

\vskip 1.1in

\noindent Shaded rectangle, filled and stroked with 0.1in pen plus filled

\vskip .1in

\noindent 
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{sh 0.5}%
\special{sh}%
\special{ip}
\hskip 2.5in
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{sh 0.5}%
\special{sh}%
\special{fp}

\vskip 1.1in

\noindent Rectangle, dashed and dotted --- short dash and dot.

\vskip .1in

\noindent 
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{da 200}
\special{da .2}
\hskip 2.5in
\special{pn 100}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{dt 200}
\special{dt .2}

\vskip 1.1in

\noindent Rectangle, dashed and dotted --- long dash and dot.

\vskip .1in
\noindent 
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{da 500}
\special{da .5}
\hskip 2.5in
\special{pn 100}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
% \special{dt 500}
\special{dt .5}

\newpage

% PAGE 5

% NOTE: DVIPSONE does not support `textcolor' and `rulecolor' \specials

% NOTE: there is some ambiguity about filled partial ellipses chord or pie?

\noindent Colored stroked rectangle solid and dashed

\vskip .25in

\special{rulecolor: 255 0 255}%
\special{pn 100}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{fp}%
\special{pn 50}%
\special{pa 2200 0}%
\special{pa 4200 0}%
\special{pa 4200 1000}%
\special{pa 2200 1000}%
\special{pa 2200 0}%
% \special{da 150}%
\special{da .15}%

\vskip 1.2in

\noindent Colored filled rectangle solid and dashed

\vskip .25in

% \special{sh 0 255 0}%
\special{cl 0 0.5 0.5}%
\special{pn 100}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{pa 2000 0}%
\special{pa 2000 1000}%
\special{pa 0 1000}%
\special{pa 0 0}%
\special{ip}%
\special{pn 50}%
\special{pa 2200 0}%
\special{pa 4200 0}%
\special{pa 4200 1000}%
\special{pa 2200 1000}%
\special{pa 2200 0}%
% \special{dt 150}%
\special{dt .15}%

\vskip 1.2in

\noindent Colored stroked ellipse complete and partial

\vskip .25in

\special{rulecolor: 255 0 255}%
\special{pn 100}%
\special{ar 1000 500 1000 500 0 6.2831853}%
\special{rulecolor: 0 255 255}%
\special{ar 3200 500 1000 500 0.5 2.0}%

\vskip 1.2in

\noindent Colored filled ellipse complete and partial

\vskip .25in

% \special{sh 0 255 0}%
\special{cl 0.5 0.5 0}%
\special{pn 100}%
\special{ia 1000 500 1000 500 0 6.2831853}%
% \special{sh 255 0 0}%
\special{cl 0.5 0 0.5}%
\special{ia 3200 500 1000 500 0.5 2.0}%
\special{cl 0.5 0.5 0}%
\special{ia 3200 500 1000 500 2.0 4.0}%
\special{cl 0 0.5 0.5}%
\special{ia 3200 500 1000 500 4.0 6.78}%

\vskip 1.2in

\noindent And that is it for today\dots

\special{rulecolor: 0 0 0}%

\end
